snippet: Officials waited to get helicopters grounded by rain and fog back into the air to rescue hundreds of people who remain cut off by floodwaters.
lead_paragraph: Officials waited to get helicopters grounded by rain and fog back into the air to rescue hundreds of people who remain cut off by floodwaters.

headline.main: Weather Grounds Copters in Colorado Rescue
headline.print_headline: Weather Grounds Copters in Colorado Rescue
